How to install CloudStick?

You need an account with CloudStick: https://cloudstick.io to get started.

You should have a server with the operating system of Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, 18.04 LTS, or 20.04 LTS .

Once the account is created, you need to click on Connect server then >> Enter your server name and select the provider, and server IP address >> enter the root password to install CloudStick on your server. The installation will take 5 - 8 minutes and your server will be ready to host websites and applications.
